lines.text: let a be a long long array of length N
read the first m elements of a
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ ) cin >> a [ i ] ;

lines.text: sort the first m elements of a
for i = 1 to m exclusive then increment ans by a [ i ] + a [ i - 1 ] - 1
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i < m ; i ++ ) ans += a [ i ] - a [ i - 1 ] - 1 ;
